analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of conditions, the triplets and couplets, the text in brief

original: 16.17. Kusalattika, Cetasikaduka🔽Kusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalattika  kusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The wholesome triad, the mental couplet🔽A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for a unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.

original: Kusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Kusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  kusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for an indeterminate, non-mental phenomenon.🔽A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for an unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.

original: Kusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko ca naabyākato nacetasiko ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko
analyzed: kusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na cetasiko ca na abyākataḥ na cetasiko ca  dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā kusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ
translated: A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for an unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.🔽A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for an unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.

original: ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca
translated: A wholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for an unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.

original: Akusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: An unwholesome, mental phenomenon is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for a unwholesome, non-mental phenomenon.

original: Akusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state arises, a condition being by way of root.

original: Akusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Akusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naabyākato nacetasiko ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko
analyzed: akusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  akusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasiko ca na abyākataḥ na cetasiko ca  dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā akusalam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasiko
translated: With an unwholesome thought-state as condition, an indeterminate thought-state arises, a condition being by way of root.🔽With an unwholesome thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an indeterminate thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. With an unwholesome thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an unwholesome thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. With an unwholesome thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an unwholesome thought-state and an indeterminate thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. Five.

original: ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.🔽Abyākataṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Abyākataṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca  abyākatam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  abyākatam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state arises, a condition being by way of root.🔽With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, an unwholesome thought-state arises, a condition being by way of root.🔽With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an unwholesome thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root.

original: Abyākataṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca
analyzed: abyākatam cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cetasiko ca na akusalaḥ na cetasiko ca
translated: With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an indeterminate thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, an unwholesome thought-state and an indeterminate thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. With an indeterminate thought-state as condition, a wholesome thought-state and an unwholesome thought-state and an indeterminate thought-state arise, a condition being by way of root. Five.

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi  hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
translated: … with mind-objects as condition: the three kinds of resultant-relation triplets. (Abbreviated.)🔽With root-cause as condition, thirteen. With object as condition, nine. … With result as condition, three. … With kamma-result as condition, three. … With nutriment as condition, three. … With faculty as condition, nine. … With contact as condition, thirteen. … With feeling as condition, thirteen. … With craving as condition, thirteen. … With clinging as condition, thirteen. … With becoming as condition, thirteen. … With birth as condition, thirteen. … With old age and death as condition, sorrow, lamentation, pain, grief, and despair come to be. Thus there is an origination of this whole mass of suffering.

original: Acetasike hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: acetasike hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: With non-causality as condition, nine. … With result as condition, three. … With non-causality as condition, nine.
